name: Dungeon Arena (itch)
description:
Welcome to Dungeon Arena, a 2D survival arena game in which you have to survive the waves and waves of enemies and avoid the hits to get as many score as possible. The best highscores are in a table so you can try and beat your own scores! It contains 2 maps with 10 waves. Are you be able to survive them all?

It is inspired by The Legend of Zelda, and was made in html and javascript in 2017.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Movement
  • Space: Use the sword
  • P: Pause the game/ Unpause the game

Sources:

  • Enemies and character by LUNARSIGNALS: https://opengameart.org/content/overhead-action-rpg-characters
  • Dungeon tiles by Buch: https://opengameart.org/content/a-blocky-dungeon
  • Sword by LUNARSIGNALS (modified): https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-items-0
  • Music by Juhani Junkala: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
  • Sounds effects are from A Link to the Past, from Nintendo. All rights belong to them.
